title: Saarnak Vegetarian Food and Health Shop
typeOfFood: Vegan, Juice bar, Ghanian, West African
description: Owned and operated by a vegan woman. Serves traditional Ghanaian cuisine, like banku, fufu, jollof, red red. Located in a busy part of the city and is very popular, so know it will be packed. No Wi-Fi or bathroom. Holds educational events on making the transition to veganism. Exact address unknown, but is located across the street from the post office so please inquire inside.
